General.Name: EE-HWA Construction Co. Ltd
General.Description: EE-HWA Construction Co., Ltd. engages in the construction business in South Korea. The company undertakes the construction of railway, road, bridge, apartment, and offices projects, as well as pharmaceutical and water treatment facilities. It is also involved in the leasing business. The company was formerly known as Dongji Co., Ltd. and changed its name to EE-HWA Construction Co., Ltd. in June 1971. EE-HWA Construction Co., Ltd. was founded in 1956 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.
